title: I Am Praying For You
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c

v1: I have a Savior, He's pleading in glory,
A dear, loving Savior, though earth-friends be few;
And now He is watching in tenderness o'er me,
And, oh, that my Savior were your Savior too!
v2: I have a Father; to me He has given
A hope for eternity, blessed and true;
And soon He will call me to meet Him in heaven,
But, oh, that He'd let me bring you with me too!
v3: I have a peace; it is calm as a river,
A peace that the friends of this world never knew;
My Savior alone is its author and giver,
And, oh, could I know it was given for you!
v4: When He has found you, tell others the story,
That my loving Savior is your Savior, too;
Then pray that your Savior may bring them to glory,
And prayer will be answered— 'twas answered for you!
c1: For you I am praying, For you I am praying,
For you I am praying, I'm praying for you.
